thread.title: Manchester United midfielder Ander Herrera hilariously struggles to parallel park tiny car
thread.title_full: Manchester United midfielder Ander Herrera hilariously struggles to parallel park tiny car

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Manchester United midfielder Ander Herrera hilariously struggles to parallel park tiny car
text:
Manchester United midfielder Ander Herrera hilariously struggles to parallel park tiny car We're just glad those were inflatable people... Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Ander Herrera is terrible at parallel parking Share this video Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Manchester United midfielder Ander Herrera is a lover of all things English - old English football grounds, English heritage and apparently ancient English cars, too. 
So the Spaniard was in for a treat when he met up with Unscriptd and Charlie Webster recently. 
Unscriptd organised for Herrera to drive an old school Mini - complete without power steering. 
After a dash around the city, via Old Trafford, the 27-year-old was then asked to complete a 30-second parallel parking challenge - as seen above. Close call with the wall (Photo: Unscriptd) A few casualties were caused in the process (Photo: Unscriptd) 
It's a struggle for the midfielder, who nearly crashes into the wall straight away and then proceeds to get his gears confused. Nearly there... (Photo: Unscriptd) Herrera celebrates victory (Photo: Unscriptd) 
But after mowing a few inflatable people down, Herrera finally manages to park the car - and in time, too. poll loading Can you parallel park better than Ander Herrera? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
